      • RouteState

        protected RouteState(InteractiveState p_parent_state,
                     BoardHandling p_board_handling,
                     Logfile p_logfile)
        Creates a new instance of RouteState If p_logfile != null, the creation of the route is stored in the logfile.
        Parameters:
        p_parent_state - a InteractiveState object.
        p_board_handling - a BoardHandling object.
        p_logfile - a Logfile object.

    • Method Detail

      • get_instance

        public static RouteState get_instance(FloatPoint p_location,
                                      InteractiveState p_parent_state,
                                      BoardHandling p_board_handling,
                                      Logfile p_logfile)
        Returns a new instance of this class or null, if starting a new route was not possible at p_location. If p_logfile != null, the creation of the route is stored in the logfile.
        Parameters:
        p_location - a FloatPoint object.
        p_parent_state - a InteractiveState object.
        p_board_handling - a BoardHandling object.
        p_logfile - a Logfile object.
        Returns:
        a RouteState object.

      • start_ok

        protected static Item start_ok(IntPoint p_location,
                               BoardHandling p_hdlg)
        Checks starting an interactive route at p_location. Returns the picked start item of the routing at p_location, or null, if no such item was found.
        Parameters:
        p_location - a IntPoint object.
        p_hdlg - a BoardHandling object.
        Returns:
        a Item object.

        public InteractiveState key_typed(char p_key_char)

      • add_corner

        public InteractiveState add_corner(FloatPoint p_location)
        Append a line to p_location to the trace routed so far. Returns from state, if the route is completed by connecting to a target.
        Parameters:
        p_location - a FloatPoint object.
        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.
